price: Sesungguhnya Allah mengetahui orang-orang yang menghalang-halangi di antara kamu dan orang-orang yang berkata kepada saudara-saudaranya, "Marilah kepada kami".  Dan mereka tidak mendatangi peperangan, melainkan sebentar.
arabic: ۞ قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad yaʿlamu al-lahu al-muʿawiqīna minkum wal-qāilīna li-ikh'wānihim halumma ilaynā walā yatūna al-basa illā qalīlan
